title: (x) Lori & Jim - Poor Richard {Jan Sandvik}
content:
Hi folks,   
   
This sample came to me from someone asking if I knew the font this embossing was done in. The big key to this mystery seems to be the ampersand. I went through the Serif and Slab Serif collections in the Font Book, and nothing had this symbol, so I am presuming that this is something newer than 1998 when that book was published.   
   
Any ideas?   
   
Thanks,   
- Mike ![Lori & Jim type](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127083107im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22714.gif)
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: That's it! Great work Jan! Thanks.
